roleset.name: forcing or driving out, discharging from
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, expel.01. Corresponds to VNcls banish-10.2, fire-10.10, remove-10.1.

example.name: TMP
example.text: The ones who are students at UC - Davis deserve immediate expulsion .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: For decades there has been a continuing effort by Israelis to cover up their expulsion of the 750,000 refugees who fled their homes during the 1948 war.
example.arg: of the 750,000 refugees who fled their homes during the 1948 war
